title: Match Making
body: Riot ive got a serious complaint about the match making is it soo unbalanced to the point i am almost quitting this game, how is it fair that i am always put against Platinum and Gold players while im only Silver 4 Yet my teammates are half the time ranked Bronze.

replies.body:
You're complaining about normals matchmaking, 

really?
this is the reason ive stop ranking as much because every game they have high level smurfs which make it real hard to win

Its the same playing at every level though. Im playing in high plat and most of my games have half the players as smurfs. It doesn't stop you from climbing though, in fact it gives you a chance to experience these players first hand and learn from them. It sucks while its happening, but in the long-run you end up better off as you slowly become more competent at playing vs these players. 

(I know this from experience, I started this season in bronze. )
Watch this video from Phylol on youtube and you will completely understand what i mean. Start at 4:30min  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CNdSzGDHTZQ
